Title: WCF REST Extensions for Silverlight
Description: Access RESTful POX and JSON web services using the WCF methodology you know and love.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
Access RESTful POX and JSON web services using the WCF methodology you know and love.

Features
  • Custom client side binding for connecting to RESTful services from Silverlight
  • Custom attributes for annotating Contract interface w/ HTTP Methods and URL Templates
  • Serialization support for JsonSerializable, XmlSerializer types, and IXmlSerializable implementation.

Status
This project is currently a feature complete v1 beta. There is certainly more that could be done, but I'm looking for feedback or community contributions to determine future direction.
